Text.Page: Elleon is looking for you to decide who goes for Titus and who goes for the villagers.
<PCNAME> and others rescued Titus from Rogash's Manor. Aurl begged <PCNAME> to save his fiancée, but <PCNAME> was too late. She was already lying down cold and still.

According to Jelena, there are two main areas in this place. A manor and a garden.

Titus and the villagers should be somewhere pass the garden.

, I want you to create a distraction so I can go deep inside."Leave it to me."

Amarre should stay here. The nagas are far too dangerous for her.

, would you explain that to Amarre.

Unknown species are right there, and you want me to stay behind?

I promise I won't get you in trouble! Please let me go with you."Sorry, Amarre."

What if...I approach as a researcher? Not as an enemy.

That looks says no.

Okay. I'll wait here. Good luck on the rescue.

, good, you found me. Thanks to your distraction, I was able to fully examine the garden and these guards.

If I am correct, the captured villagers are behind that door.

But it seems a naga's identification tag is required to open that door.

, would you get the tag?

Did you get the tag? Let's see. Yes, we'll be able to get inside now.

Let's go.
We need that tag to get inside.
Give me the key, <PCNAME>. I'll open the door.
That draakon must have the key.

What took you so long?

I can't believe that you left me here to suffer in the hands of the nagas.

Anyways, thanks for rescuing me. The nagas took away my tools...they're smarter then I thought.

I have to get my tools back.

, thank you so much! A lot of the other villagers were dragged down to a place called the Larvae Hatchery.

My fiancée is there too. Please, please, save her.

Let's see...this and that...all right, everything seems to be here.

How about we just blow this place up, too?

We should get out of here before more nagas arrive.

Let's get back to Jelena and Amarre.

! I saw you go inside. You made it! Is everyone all right?

I found another place where they're keeping villagers.

But we can't move them and these all at once. It's too dangerous. What should we do?

It's a plan! We'll go and rescue the villagers.

Come with me. I'll guide you to the place.

This is it.

The entrance leads to a place full of larvae. I saw people trapped there.

Take this platform and go down. You won't miss them.

This place is larger than I thought. Look at all those larvae and nagas...

This won't be easy.

Wait! Did you hear that?"Hear what?"

Someone is calling for help.

This way, follow me! Quick!

Thank you!

I thought I was done for. Thank you so much for saving me.

This place is just awful! There are more people trapped down there."Have you seen Airene?"

Yes, I saw her.

They took her down there. That place gives me the shivers.

She's Aurl's fiancée? Right?

But Aurl is all right? That's a relief.

Please go save Airene and the others.
(You carefully shake Airene and call her name, but she lies still.)

I...I'll take Airene.

, please...please bring justice to the bloody nagas who killed Airene!

I beg you!

I've double checked and there's no one left behind.

Let's get out of this miserable place.

Did you find Aurl's fiancée?"I did...but..."

Oh...

I'm sorry to hear that...

I'd blow this place up for Aurl...but I should save the explosives for the greater good.

Let's get out of here.

Good. Looks like everyone is here.

I'm still worried about Aurl. It will be nearly impossible for him to stay calm after what happened to Airene, but...

Maybe, you should talk to Elleon about Aurl.

You're worried that Aurl might not be thinking clearly because of his grief?

But who are we to judge Aurl, when we don't even have a clue about the grief he is feeling.

We should focus on stopping the nagas from making victims like Aurl and get them back to their families.
